content:
COMPANY OVERVIEW
KKR & Co. Inc., together with its subsidiaries, is a leading global investment firm that offers alternative asset management and capital markets and insurance solutions. KKR aims to generate attractive investment returns by following a patient and disciplined investment approach, employing world-class people, and supporting growth in its portfolio companies and communities. KKR sponsors investment funds that invest in private equity, credit and real assets and has strategic partners that manage hedge funds. KKR’s insurance subsidiaries offer retirement, life and reinsurance products under the management of The Global Atlantic Financial Group. KKR 2024 MBA Internship Program - Global Client Solutions
New York
KKR is seeking current 1st-year MBA students (graduation date: Spring 2025) for our 2024 MBA Internship Program and to be an active part of a team-oriented environment. The internship is 10-weeks in length and will take place in our New York office. Following the conclusion of the internship, 2025 full-time offers may be extended to exceptional performers.
Global Client Solutions (KCS)

Global team responsible for supporting and interacting with the firm’s Limited Partners. The group drives client engagement focused around capital raising, new product development, and origination for institutional clients and retail investors
Leverage deep expertise on a specific strategy to drive fund launches, complete detailed investment due diligence, negotiate contracts, grow relationships with existing and new investors, and ultimately, raise capital for KKR’s various strategies
Focused on building, maintaining, and expanding relationships with our clients while delivering solutions across the KKR platform

Position Description

10-week summer internship with Relationship Management and Product Strategies teams focused-on raising capital, structuring KKR funds, analyzing competitors, and strategizing future opportunities
Understand, analyze, and synthesize qualitative and quantitative information about institutional, retail, family office and high net worth investors
Prepare briefing memos to advise on recommendations of products appropriate to the investor and suggest new potential clients based on this research
Periodically create and update bespoke marketing materials, quarterly presentations and reporting materials.
Provide ongoing LP support and remain heavily involved when investors are conducting due diligence on KKR funds
Work closely with investment professionals and deal teams to understand the current portfolio, deal pipeline, and overall market dynamics
Work closely with others on the Relationship Management and Product Strategies teams on client requests (related to both capital raising, diligence and one-off servicing requests), client presentations, sales territory management, and CRM database management
Aid in the development and maintenance of CPG business metrics and reports
Assist with other team projects and initiatives on an ad-hoc basic

Primary Qualifications and Skills

Current 1st-year MBA student with anticipated graduation date of Spring 2025
Interest in broader fundraising and product development
Aptitude for critical and creative thinking across the quantitative and qualitative spectrum
Maturity, presence, sound judgment, and ability to form and express opinions effectively to cross-divisional teams including senior management
Proven ability to manage demands of multiple teams and projects in a fast-paced work environment
Strong relationship development skills, including over the phone with global teams
Quick learner with clear intellectual curiosity and self-motivation
Outstanding oral and written communication skills, including the ability to read information/situations from varying perspectives and tailor messages to suit different audiences
Strong organization skills with an emphasis on attention to detail
Technical and aesthetic mastery of PowerPoint and Excel
Content driven with the ability to communicate complex topics to a wide range of audiences

Application Instructions:

Deadline to apply is December 3rd -- 11:59pm ET
You can submit a maximum of 2 applications
